text: The Handsome Fisherman (Turkish: Balikçı Güzeli) is a 1953 Turkish adventure film directed by Baha Gelenbevi and starring Cüneyt Gökçer, Ayten Çankaya and Münir Özkul.Scognamillo & Demirhan p.355 ==Cast== * Cüneyt Gökçer * Ayten Çankaya * Münir Özkul * Nese Yulaç * Hayri Esen * Nezihe Becerikli * Ertuğrul Bilda * Orhan Boran * Gülderen Ece * Muzaffer Nebioğlu * Feridun Çölgeçen * Kadri Ögelman ==References== ==Bibliography== * Giovanni Scognamillo & Metin Demirhan. Fantastik Türk sineması. Kabalcı Yayınevi, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1953 films Category:1953 adventure films Category:Turkish-language films Category:Turkish films Category:Turkish adventure films Category:Turkish black-and-white films
title: The Handsome Fisherman
